FuncDef: This command configures the user of link fragmentation and interleaving and is applicable only to LNS. Interleaving is supported only on MLPPPoX bundles that contain a single member link. If more than one link is present in the MLPPPoX bundle, interleaving is automatically disabled and a TRAP/log (tmnxMlpppBundleIndicatorsChange) is generated.

ParaDef.Info: Always perform interleaving on single linked MLPPPoX sessions within this tunnel, regardless of the configuration option for interleaving under the group level.
Never perform interleaving on single linked MLPPPoX sessions within this tunnel, regardless of the configuration option for interleaving under the group level.
